text: @FaleciaMaureen @Kennnuh @thedominator939 @physicsdad23 @NYGovCuomo I'm curious...can you provide proof that masks don't work? As mentioned, medical professionals can and do wear them for hours. So if you're having surgery, you'd be ok with the doctor NOT wearing a mask while standing over your open, susceptible body? God forbid he sneezes.
